formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'ReadFile' =-
[Synopsis] ReadFile(varname=file,length)
[Description] ReadFile(varname=file,length) Varname - Result stored here. File - The name of the file to read. Length - Maximum number of characters to capture.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,10 +1,10 @@ -= Info about application 'ReadFile' =-
[Synopsis] - ReadFile(varname=file,length) + Read the contents of a text file into a channel variable
[Description] ReadFile(varname=file,length) - Varname - Result stored here. - File - The name of the file to read. - Length - Maximum number of characters to capture. + varname - Result stored here. + file - The name of the file to read. + length - Maximum number of characters to capture.
